description: Essential development tools, Git, CLI, and IDEs

definition.text: Git is a distributed version control system that tracks changes in source code during software development. It enables collaboration, branching, and maintaining a complete history of changes.

keyConcepts.name: Basic Git Workflow
keyConcepts.concept:
git clone <repo>    # Get repository
git add .           # Stage changes
git commit -m "msg" # Save changes
git push            # Upload to remote
git pull            # Get latest changes
keyConcepts.meaning: Clone â†’ Edit â†’ Stage â†’ Commit â†’ Push

keyConcepts.name: Branching Strategy
keyConcepts.concept:
git branch feature    # Create branch
git checkout feature  # Switch to it
git checkout -b fix   # Create and switch
git merge feature     # Merge into current
keyConcepts.meaning: Branches isolate work until it's ready to merge

examples.question: Create a feature branch and merge it

steps.action: Create and switch to feature branch
steps.explanation: -b creates and switches in one command

steps.result: git add . && git commit -m 'Add login feature'
git checkout main && git merge feature/new-login

examples.finalAnswer: Feature is now merged into main branch

codeSnippets.title: Undo Last Commit
codeSnippets.code:
# Undo commit, keep changes staged
git reset --soft HEAD~1

# Undo commit, unstage changes
git reset HEAD~1

# Undo commit, discard changes
git reset --hard HEAD~1
codeSnippets.description: Different ways to undo the last commit

definition.text: The command line interface (CLI) allows direct interaction with the operating system through text commands. Mastering the CLI increases productivity and enables automation.

keyConcepts.name: File Navigation
keyConcepts.concept:
pwd          # Print working directory
ls -la       # List files (detailed)
cd folder    # Change directory
cd ..        # Go up one level
cd ~         # Go to home directory

keyConcepts.name: File Operations
keyConcepts.concept:
touch file.txt  # Create empty file
mkdir folder    # Create directory
cp src dest     # Copy
mv src dest     # Move/rename
rm file         # Remove (careful!)
rm -rf folder   # Remove directory
keyConcepts.meaning: Create, copy, move, and delete files

examples.question: Find all Python files modified in the last day

steps.action: Use find command with time filter

examples.codeExample:
# Find Python files modified today
find . -name '*.py' -mtime -1

# Find and count lines
find . -name '*.py' | xargs wc -l

practicalApplications.title: Automation
practicalApplications.description: Write shell scripts for repetitive tasks

definition.text: Package managers automate the process of installing, updating, and managing software dependencies. Each language ecosystem has its own package manager.

keyConcepts.name: npm (Node.js)
keyConcepts.concept:
npm init              # Create package.json
npm install express   # Install package
npm install -D jest   # Dev dependency
npm install           # Install all deps
npm update            # Update packages

keyConcepts.name: pip (Python)
keyConcepts.concept:
pip install requests        # Install package
pip install -r requirements.txt  # From file
pip freeze > requirements.txt    # Save deps
pip uninstall package            # Remove

examples.question: Set up a new Node.js project
examples.finalAnswer: Project ready with package.json and node_modules

definition.text: Visual Studio Code is a lightweight, powerful code editor with built-in Git support, debugging, and extensive extension ecosystem. It's the most popular editor for web development.

keyConcepts.name: Essential Shortcuts
keyConcepts.concept:
âŒ˜P / Ctrl+P      - Quick file open
âŒ˜â‡§P / Ctrl+Shift+P - Command palette
âŒ˜D / Ctrl+D      - Multi-select word
âŒ¥â†‘â†“ / Alt+â†‘â†“     - Move line up/down
âŒ˜/ / Ctrl+/      - Toggle comment

keyConcepts.name: Must-Have Extensions
keyConcepts.concept:
â€¢ Prettier - Code formatting
â€¢ ESLint - JavaScript linting
â€¢ GitLens - Git superpowers
â€¢ Live Server - Local dev server
â€¢ Python - Python support
â€¢ Copilot - AI assistance

examples.question: Debug a Node.js application

steps.result: Press F5 or click Run > Start Debugging
Use Variables panel or hover over code
steps.explanation: See current values and step through code

examples.finalAnswer: VS Code debugger lets you inspect program state at runtime

definition.text: Shell scripts automate command-line tasks by combining multiple commands into executable files. They're essential for DevOps, system administration, and development workflows.

keyConcepts.name: Script Structure
keyConcepts.concept:
#!/bin/bash
# Shebang tells which interpreter to use

# Variables
NAME="World"
echo "Hello, $NAME!"

# Exit with success
exit 0
keyConcepts.meaning: Scripts start with shebang and can use variables

keyConcepts.name: Control Structures
keyConcepts.concept:
# Conditionals
if [ -f "file.txt" ]; then
  echo "File exists"
fi

# Loops
for i in 1 2 3; do
  echo "Number: $i"
done
keyConcepts.meaning: Use if/then and loops for logic

examples.question: Create a backup script
examples.finalAnswer: Executable script that creates compressed backup
examples.codeExample:
#!/bin/bash

# Backup script
DATE=$(date +%Y%m%d)
BACKUP_DIR="/backups"
SOURCE="./src"

# Create backup
tar -czf "$BACKUP_DIR/backup-$DATE.tar.gz" "$SOURCE"

if [ $? -eq 0 ]; then
  echo "Backup successful!"
else
  echo "Backup failed!"
  exit 1
fi
